subject: Sugar Bowl
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Since Saban became the team’s coach after the 2006 season, the Crimson Tide have gone 91-16, a dynasty that has benefited fans, radio hosts, entrepreneurs and the university itself.
snippet: Since Saban became the team’s coach after the 2006 season, the Crimson Tide have gone 91-16, a dynasty that has benefited fans, radio hosts, entrepreneurs and the university itself.
